issue.title: Hokuyo laser sensor in DRC Sim should conform to REP 117

content.raw:
Just to reiterate, this definitely wrong in drcsim 1.2 (or generally in the gazebo laser plugin). Measurements exceeding the maximum range of 10.0 just get assigned a value of 10.0, which is wrong and also contradicts the basic convention stated in the [sensor_msgs/Laserscan](http://www.ros.org/doc/api/sensor_msgs/html/msg/LaserScan.html) msg definition:

> float32[] ranges         # range data [m] (Note: values < range_min or > range_max should be discarded)

This way, true max range readings cannot be distinguished from "no return/max range exceeded" readings.
